title: Bara brith
ingredients: ['2 tea bags', '330ml (11 fl oz) boiling water', '225g (8 oz) mixed dried fruit', '170g (6 oz) self-raising white flour', '170g (6 oz) self-raising wholemeal flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon ground mixed spice', '55g (2 oz) light muscovado sugar', '1 egg, beaten']
